name: Bill Starr 5×5 (Linear Progression)
intensity_range: Work up in sets to a top set of 5
time_per_session_breakdown: 5 sets x ~40s each + rests = ~15-20 min per main lift
overview_and_execution: Classic 5×5 with ramping: e.g. 50%, 60%, 70%, 80%, 90% for sets of 5, reaching a top set. Increase top set weekly if successful.
example_application: Squat: 135×5, 185×5, 225×5, 275×5, 315×5 (top). Next week aim 320 for top set.
important_notes: Don’t overshoot on early sets. The final set is the main driver. Good for novices/intermediates adding weight weekly.
volume_metrics: 25 total reps (5 sets × 5) per main lift.
